meanings.definition: An outer garment worn over other clothing.
meanings.sent1: During winter, people wear topcoats to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: She looked elegant in her long topcoat.
meanings.sent3: The topcoat flapped in the wind like a superhero cape.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like a comforting topcoat on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The topcoat was a stylish addition to his outfit.

meanings.definition: A coat of paint or varnish applied over a base coat.
meanings.sent1: The painter carefully applied the topcoat to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The topcoat added a glossy finish to the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints in the wet topcoat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the topcoat that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The topcoat protected the wood from scratches and stains.

meanings.definition: The uppermost layer of fur on an animal.
meanings.sent1: The thick topcoat of the husky kept it warm in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The topcoat of the rabbit was soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used its topcoat to blend in with the tree bark.
meanings.sent4: The topcoat of the lion shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The topcoat of the polar bear was essential for insulation in the cold Arctic.
